members.joinCircumstances: Buggy is the founder and captain of the Buggy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Buggy Pirates Terrorize Orange Town
keyMoments.description: The Buggy Pirates are introduced as they occupy and terrorize Orange Town under Captain Buggy's command.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the Buggy Pirates, one of the first pirate crews Luffy encounters in the East Blue.

keyMoments.title: Cannon Redirected at Buggy's Crew
keyMoments.description: Zoro and Nami redirect the Buggy Ball cannon to fire at the Buggy Pirates crew members.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Buggy Pirates facing their first serious opposition from Luffy's allies.

ships.description: Buggy's pirate ship, designed to look like a circus tent.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a striped captain's hat with crossbones behind it, styled to look like a clown
